attributes.action: discard Salman Rushdie’s off this years honours list immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a representative of the Muslim population who live and work in the UK harmoniously along with people of different cultural and religious beliefs demands that the Prime Minister in declining to forward Salman Rushdie’s candidacy in this year or future years of Queens honours list in any category.  The comments from his book are beyond belief and are offensive, derogatory, discourteous and promotes religious discrimination in today’s secular society in the UK and abroad.

Thank you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
